'Cetrimonium chloride' is a topical antiseptic. It is also commonly used in hair
conditioners and shampoos, as a conditioning agent. [http://www.naturallycurly.com/curlreading/curly-q-a/curlchemist-
what-is-cetrimonium-chloride What is cetrimonium chloride?] at
naturallycurly.com
